mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam.person ( username, sex, xueli, major, skill, workId ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{sex}, #{xueli}, #{major}, #{skill}, #{workId} );
mapper.update: UPDATE exam.person SET username = #{username}, sex = #{sex}, xueli = #{xueli}, major = #{major}, skill = #{skill}, workId = #{workId} WHERE person.id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM exam.person ORDER BY id
